'''Alpha v1.0.5'''<ref>{{ytl|Yl-O-hUXnMY|Minecraft 2 - Crafting a Workbench|ParaWork|July 15, 2010}}</ref><ref>{{ytl|MJBtjxhsCH4|Minecraft: Snowballs!|Gnomonymous|July 13, 2010}}</ref><ref>{{ytl|QQiqCQg3g0M|Fastest way to get Snowballs|beastateverythin|July 13, 2010}}</ref> is a version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released on July 13, 2010,<ref>[[wordofnotch:808025061|Minecraft Alpha 1.0.5]] – The Word of Notch, July 13, 2010,</ref> which adds [[snowball]]s, [[snow block]]s, and fixes bugs.

Alpha v1.0.5 was reuploaded 16 minutes after release to fix a bug with [[snow]].

== Additions ==
{{Additions table
|Snow Block
|Snowball
}}

=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Snow Block JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Snow Block]]'''
* Drops 6 snowballs when destroyed.
* Crafted with [[snowball]].
{{Crafting table
|A1=Snowball
|A2=Snowball
|A3=Snowball
|B1=Snowball
|B2=Snowball
|B3=Snowball
|C1=Snowball
|C2=Snowball
|C3=Snowball
|Output=Snow Block}}

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Snowball JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Snowball]]s'''
* Can be thrown, but deal no damage.

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Oak Wall Sign (S) JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Sign]]s'''
* No longer require a free block above them when placing them.

'''[[File:Ice JE3 BE5.png|32px]] [[Ice]]'''
* Increased hardness from 0.1 to 0.5.

'''[[File:Snow (layers 1) JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Snow]]'''
* Drops snowballs when broken by any means other than replacing with another block.

=== General ===
'''[[Crash]]es'''
* Game no longer saves on crashes.

== Fixes ==
'''3 bugs fixed'''
* Fixed building on snow bug.
* Fixed [[ice]] rendering bug.
* Third person view no longer causes water particles to surround the player.

== Bugs ==
'''1 bug reported'''
* Entity shadows are glitched.

== Reupload fixes ==
=== Blocks ===
[[File:Snow (layers 1) JE1 BE1.png|width=32x32]]''' [[Snow]]'''
* No longer goes through [[glass]].
